Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider.recipe

Interface RecipeExtension

All Known Subinterfaces:
CompressionExtension, CraftingExtension, RemovalExtension, SmeltingExtension, ToolExtension
All Known Implementing Classes:
RecipeProviderBase
public interface RecipeExtension

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Consumer<net.minecraft.data.recipes.FinishedRecipe>
    consumer()
    Gets the Consumer for finished recipes to add recipes to.
    default List<net.minecraft.advancements.CriterionTriggerInstance>
    criteria​(net.minecraft.world.item.crafting.Ingredient item)
    Gets a list of criteria that should be ORed, meaning that the recipe should unlock when one of them is completed instead of all of them.
    net.minecraft.advancements.CriterionTriggerInstance
    criterion​(net.minecraft.advancements.critereon.ItemPredicate... items)
    Builds an advancement criterion that requires all of the given items.
    net.minecraft.advancements.CriterionTriggerInstance
    criterion​(net.minecraft.tags.Tag<net.minecraft.world.item.Item> item)
    Builds an advancement criterion for the given tag.
    net.minecraft.advancements.CriterionTriggerInstance
    criterion​(net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike item)
    Builds an advancement criterion for the given item.
    RecipeProviderBase
    provider()
    Gets the RecipeProviderBase for this extension.
